title: Episode 156 w/ the DC Family
itunes:title: Episode 156 w/ the DC Family
description:
N.O.R.E & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. On this episode the hosts join up with their Drink Champs family Haz, Sonny D, Mr Lee, Drink Champ Sports, Boris and the rest of the gang to talk about current events. Big Mato and SPk pop up as well to talk El Control podcast and current projects. Follow Drink Champs http://www.drinkchamps.com http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps http://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps DJ EFN http://www.crazyhood.com http://www.instagram.com/whoscrazy http://www.twitter.com/djefn http://www.facebook.com/crazyhoodproductions N.O.R.E. http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga http://www.twitter.com/noreaga --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
